floater.name: floatermediafilter
floater.title: Media Filter

check_box.name: enable_mediafilter
check_box.label: Enable Media Filter
check_box.tool_tip: Enables filtering media URLs by domain names.

check_box.name: filter_only_remote
check_box.label: Filter only when a script initiates the stream (less secure)
check_box.tool_tip: This will prevent popups asking about URLs that are permanently set on a parcel. Only scripted changes to the media URL and scripted requests to start playing a stream will be filtered.

floater.text: Domains in bold are in the persistent list (i.e. they are whitelisted or blacklisted).
Domains in italics are in the session list (i.e. they are temporarily allowed or denied).

button.name: add_whitelist
button.label: Add...
button.tool_tip: Add a server to the whitelist

button.name: remove_whitelist
button.label: Remove
button.tool_tip: Remove the selected server from the whitelist

button.name: show_ips
button.label: Show IPs
button.tool_tip: Show the IP associated with each domain name (makes the viewer pause while the list is refreshed, because of DNS lookups)

button.name: add_blacklist
button.label: Add...
button.tool_tip: Add a server to the blacklist

button.name: remove_blacklist
button.label: Remove
button.tool_tip: Remove the selected server from the blacklist

check_box.name: match_ip
check_box.label: Add/remove matching IP
check_box.tool_tip: Add or remove any IP associated with the added or removed domain name

line_editor.name: input_domain
line_editor.tool_tip: Enter the new URL, domain name, IP or scripted object HTTP server path here
